snippet: When Jared Soares started photographing rappers in Virginia, they were suspicious. But he won them over with his love of hip-hop culture. In turn, they taught him a few things about creativity, expression - and straight-up hard work.
abstract: When Jared Soares started photographing rappers in Virginia, they were suspicious. But he won them over with his love of hip-hop culture. In turn, they taught him a few things about creativity, expression - and straight-up hard work.
